name: AVCaptionRegion
desc: An object that represents the region in which the system presents a caption.

items.name: class var appleITTTop: AVCaptionRegion
items.desc: The top region for iTT format captions.

items.name: class var appleITTBottom: AVCaptionRegion
items.desc: The bottom region for iTT format captions.

items.name: class var appleITTLeft: AVCaptionRegion
items.desc: The left region for iTT format captions.

items.name: class var appleITTRight: AVCaptionRegion
items.desc: The right region for iTT format captions.

items.name: class var subRipTextBottom: AVCaptionRegion
items.desc: The bottom caption region for SubRip Text (SRT) format captions.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the region.

items.name: struct AVCaptionDimension
items.desc: A structure that defines a caption dimension.

items.name: struct AVCaptionPoint
items.desc: A structure that defines the origin point for a caption.

items.name: var size: AVCaptionSize
items.desc: The height and width of the region.

items.name: struct AVCaptionSize
items.desc: A structure that defines the height and width of a caption.

items.name: var displayAlignment: AVCaptionRegion.DisplayAlignment
items.desc: The alignment of lines for the region.

items.name: enum AVCaptionRegion.DisplayAlignment
items.desc: Constants that indicate the alignment of lines in a region.

items.name: var scroll: AVCaptionRegion.Scroll
items.desc: The scroll mode of the region.

items.name: enum AVCaptionRegion.Scroll
items.desc: Constants that indicate the scrolling effects the system applies to a region.

items.name: var writingMode: AVCaptionRegion.WritingMode
items.desc: The block and inline progression direction of the region.

items.name: enum AVCaptionRegion.WritingMode
items.desc: Constants that indicate the writing mode for a region.
